unique_internal_blocks.title: Press Release Monetary Policy Committee May 2024
unique_internal_blocks.text: During its monthly meeting on May 16, 2024, the MPC decided to reduce the reserve requirement rate from 21.5 percent to 20.5 percent as of June 1, 2024.
